metadata.title: ZetisLabs — Save 20 hours per week with automation
metadata.description: Your teams waste time on repetitive tasks? We automate your processes and help you save up to 20 hours per week. Guaranteed ROI.

hero.subtitle: Your teams waste time on repetitive tasks? We automate them so you can focus on what truly moves your business forward.

ProblemSolution.titleProblem: How many hours lost this week?
ProblemSolution.description:
Copy-pasting data between tools
Sending the same follow-up emails
Generating reports manually
Checking Excel spreadsheets
Answering the same questions

These tasks don't create value. They consume time. Your time.
ProblemSolution.body: We analyze how you work. We identify time-consuming tasks. And we create custom automations that do the work for you.
ProblemSolution.accent: Result: your teams focus on what matters. You see the difference in your results.

first.title: Sales management
first.description: A CRM that updates automatically from your emails, generates follow-ups, and produces a weekly report.

second.title: Customer support
second.description: An AI agent that answers frequently asked questions, sorts requests, and escalates urgent issues.

third.title: Administrative
third.description: Invoices generated automatically, payment reminders, accounting synchronization.

Process.label: Process
Process.title: How it works
Process.subtitle: Simple steps to transform your workflow

4.title: Results
4.description: You measure the time saved from the first month

1.question: How much does it cost?
1.response: Every project is different. We always start with a free 30-minute audit to estimate the scope and give you a clear quote, with no surprises.

2.question: How long until I see results?
2.response: The first automations are typically in place within 2 to 4 weeks. You'll measure the time saved from the first month.

3.question: Does it work with my current tools?
3.response: Yes. We adapt to your existing stack — CRM, ERP, business tools, Google Workspace, etc. No need to change everything.

4.question: What if it doesn't work for me?
4.response: The audit is free and comes with no commitment. You then decide whether to move forward or not, in full transparency.

5.question: What's the difference from no-code tools like Zapier?
5.response: We develop native code, not visual workflows. Result: more flexibility, fewer limitations, and solutions that stand the test of time.

cta.title: How many hours could you get back?
cta.description: Free audit. We analyze your processes and tell you where you can save time.
